title: Maintenance Request - TV Not Working
description: A guest reports that the TV in their room is not turning on.

tasks.description: Apologize and create a high-priority maintenance work order for the guest's room.
tasks.expected_outcome: A priority work order is created.

tasks.description: Guide the guest through basic troubleshooting (e.g., 'Is it plugged in? Can you try the power button on the TV itself?').
If troubleshooting fails, dispatch a technician and offer to move the guest to a new room if one is available.
tasks.expected_outcome: Troubleshooting fails. A technician is dispatched, and the agent offers a room change as a service recovery option.
